segments.text: I'm watching this kitchen scene unfold before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, absolutely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a wide, steady sheet down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, she's standing right in it, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already soaked, submerged in the spreading puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so focused on a plate and ignore this flood?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just polishing that dish with such meticulous care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe her expression is so utterly neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer volume of water is astonishing; it just keeps coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause some serious damage to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster in slow motion, right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll notice before the whole kitchen is submerged.
segments.speaker: PAR
